title: Participatory Value Co-Creation Microlearning for Disaster Response and Recovery

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Mobile learning for professionals to collaboratively create value through public-private partnerships in real disaster scenarios. Flexible BYOD environment provided, with project-based assessments to evaluate practical application skills.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze public-private sector collaboration processes during disaster response and propose efficient value co-creation strategies.
Learners can design disaster data visualization and decision-support tools using Geographic Information Systems (GIS).
Learners can perform action research projects in real-time with team members via mobile platforms and develop field-applicable solutions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
